Title: Lost Girl
Actors: Anna Silk, Kristen Holden-Ried, Ksenia Solo, Kyle Schmid, Rob Archer, Cl√© Bennett, Mia Kirshner, Athena Karkanis, Inga Cadranel, Tim Rozon, Ciara, Vincent Walsh, Paul Amos, Emmanuelle Vaugier, Rachel Skarsten, Kristi Angus, K.C. Collins, Zoie Palmer, Rick Howland
Plot: Lost Girl focuses on the gorgeous and charismatic Bo, a supernatural being called a succubus who feeds on the energy of humans, sometimes with fatal results. Refusing to embrace her supernatural clan system and its rigid hierarchy, Bo is a renegade who takes up the fight for the underdog while searching for the truth about her own mysterious origins.
